item.title: Affordable Europe
item.author: Author
item.description:
ğŸ“Š Affordable European Countries vs. Education Quality: The Best Bang for Your Buck

ğŸ“ Introduction

Hello #DataFam!

Iâ€™m thrilled to share my first-ever personal data visualization project created during my data visualization course at the University of North Texas! In this project, I analyzed a dataset that explores education expenses across European countries, focusing on how affordability correlates with education quality.

ğŸ” Research Questions

  1. Which countries provide the most budget-friendly education options, considering tuition and living costs?
  2. What is the average tuition fee across these countries?
  3. How does the cost compare to the quality of education provided?

ğŸ’¡ Key Insights

âœ… Cost & Living Expenses Matter: When considering affordable education in Europe, both tuition fees and living costs must be considered together.
